input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black

Product keywords:
Board Material: Wood
Covering Material: Carpet | Color: Black
Very easy to assemble | Step by step instructions and tools are included.
Overall Dimension: 47 " H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W
Shipping weight: 28 LBS
input_text.Response A: This cat tree is the perfect addition to any home with furry friends! The 47" level condo furniture scratching post pet house is made with high-quality wood and features a sleek black design that will complement any room in your home. The scratching post is perfect for your cat to release their natural scratching instincts, while the condo provides a cozy space for them to relax and nap. The overall dimension of the product is 47" H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W and it weighs 28 LBS, making it easy to move around as needed. Assembly is a breeze, and the step-by-step instructions and tools are included.
input_text.Response B:
You want to be the go-to source for information on this particular product.

This cat tree is the ultimate luxury playground for your furry friend! The sturdy base is made of solid wood and the covering is a soft, plush carpet that is easy to clean. Your cat will love the multiple levels and scratching posts, and you will love the beautiful design that blends seamlessly with your home decor. The assembly is very easy, and all the necessary tools and instructions are included. With so many great features, this cat tree is the perfect gift for your cat and for yourself.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: It was factual, rather than a flight of fancy
label_annotations.factors_b: It offered very few relevant facts
label_annotations.feedback: Both were off mark, the first was a list of attributes, the second tied to be "touchy-feely" without really describing the item.
